ResourceHeader.Description: 4-sec vector magnetic field values recorded by the NASA ISEE-2 satellite
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: UCLA-IGPP ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server

InformationURL.Name: UCLA-IGPP ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server
InformationURL.Description: Data at 60-s and 4-s resolution are available for the entire ISEE mission (October 22, 1977 through September 25, 1987) and can be displayed either as a plot or an ASCII listing. The ISEE-1 and -2 magnetometer data server is provided by the Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics (IGPP) at UCLA, through a grant to Robert J. Strangeway from the NASA Space Physics Data System (SPDS).

AccessURL.Description: The folder contains 4-sec ISEE-2 magnetometter data in the IGPP flat file format.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: UCLA-IGPP ISEE Magnetometer Interactive Data Server

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Time, a real*8 value that is the number of seconds since Jan 1, 1966 at 00:00:00.000. This time is also referred to as Cline Time or CTIME.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Description: Triaxial magnetic field vector in spacecraft (SC) coordinates

Structure.Description: The three elements are BX, BY, BZ in spacecraft (SC) coordinates
